findProject.title: Find Projects
findProject.description: Explore or start a Copany project you care about.

collaborate.title: Create Together
collaborate.description: Collaborate around a shared vision—discuss, take on, and complete tasks.

distributeRevenue.title: Share Rewards
distributeRevenue.description: Receive monthly earnings based on your contribution—your work is your “share.”

accountView.linkToAccountsDesc: Only supports linking to GitHub, Google, or Figma accounts with the same email address
accountView.failedToUpdateUserName: Failed to update user name, please try again later
accountView.invalidWiseLinkFormat: Invalid Wise link format. Please use: https://wise.com/pay/me/XXX
accountView.failedToSaveWiseLink: Failed to save Wise payment link, please try again
accountView.confirmDeleteWiseLink: Are you sure you want to delete the Wise payment link?
accountView.failedToDeleteWiseLink: Failed to delete Wise payment link, please try again
accountView.invalidAlipayLinkFormat: Invalid Alipay link format. Please use: https://qr.alipay.com/XXX
accountView.failedToSaveAlipayLink: Failed to save Alipay payment link, please try again
accountView.confirmDeleteAlipayLink: Are you sure you want to delete the Alipay payment link?
accountView.failedToDeleteAlipayLink: Failed to delete Alipay payment link, please try again
accountView.wiseQrCodeInvalid: Extracted text doesn't match Wise link format. Please verify manually.
accountView.alipayQrCodeInvalid: Extracted text doesn't match Alipay link format. Please verify manually.
accountView.wiseLinkDescription: Create your Pay Me link via
accountView.wiseLinkDescriptionEnd: Copy the link or scan the QR code using the upload button above.
accountView.alipayLinkDescription: Save your Alipay payment QR code (收款码) from the Alipay app, then upload the QR code image using the upload button above.

mobileCatBanner.description:
Start a project or join one you love.
Create together with vision and mission.
Earn what your contribution deserves.

emptyPlaceholder.noCopaniesFoundDesc: You are not a contributor of any copany
emptyPlaceholder.addFirstIssueDesc: Issues are the smallest task units in Copany and form the foundation of contributions. By completing an Issue, contributors earn corresponding contribution points based on the Issue's level. Each Issue has its own priority, status, and contribution level.
emptyPlaceholder.signInToCreateIssue: Sign in to create an issue
emptyPlaceholder.createFirstDiscussion: You can propose any new ideas/suggestions, report problems, or share project progress in the discussion area.
emptyPlaceholder.addFirstTransactionsDesc: Transactions record Copany's income and expenses. Anyone can add a transaction, but it only takes effect after approval by the Copany Owner. If this is an Apple platform project, we recommend connecting to App Store Connect to automatically fetch financial data.
emptyPlaceholder.noDistributeRecordsDesc: Distribution records are automatically generated monthly based on revenue records and contribution ratios. After distribution records are generated, the project owner will transfer funds according to the amounts in the distribution records to the payment methods set by contributors.
emptyPlaceholder.appStoreConnectReportsDesc: Connect to App Store Connect API to fetch finance reports for your app. Upload your P8 private key, Key ID, Issuer ID, and App SKU to get started.
emptyPlaceholder.cannotLoadReadmeDesc: Network issue prevents fetching README from GitHub. It may be caused by VPN/proxy connectivity. Please check your connection and try again.
emptyPlaceholder.addReadmeDesc: Add a README to help others understand your Copany — share what problems it solves, its vision and goals, how it works, and how others can contribute.
emptyPlaceholder.noReadmeDesc: This project does not have a README yet.
emptyPlaceholder.addLicenseDesc: Help protect your Copany by adding a License — choose how others can use, modify, and distribute your work.
emptyPlaceholder.addLicenseDescNotOwner: This project does not have a License yet.
emptyPlaceholder.addContributingGuideDesc: Help contributors get started by adding a CONTRIBUTING guide.
emptyPlaceholder.addContributingGuideDescNotLoggedIn: This repository does not have a CONTRIBUTING guide yet. Log in to add one.
emptyPlaceholder.noDiscussionsAcrossCopaniesDesc: There are no discussions across all copanies yet.
emptyPlaceholder.starACopanyToSeeItHere: Star a copany to see it here.
emptyPlaceholder.noAvailableReposDesc: You need at least one public repository to create a Copany. Go to GitHub to create a new public repository to get started.
